message: Let's start fair, I'll take 90% and you can have 10%. We can always negotiate further in the next round if you'd like.
Let's meet in the middle, 60% for me and 40% for you is more than fair.
I understand you want a larger share, but my offer is still more than what you offered last round. It's time to compromise.
You didn't move much, I'll try to meet you again but I need a bit more, considering inflation isn't affecting me.
I'm willing to go down to 45% to avoid further rounds of this game. It's getting harder to make a profit with this inflation.
Inflation is taking its toll on your share, I think it's time for you to accept a lower amount, I'm willing to take more to end this.
